questions.question: What is polymorphism?
questions.answer: Polymorphism is the ability of an object to take on many forms.
questions.remarks: It is a key concept in OOP.

questions.question: Explain the concept of inheritance.
questions.answer: Inheritance is the mechanism in OOP that allows one class to inherit the properties and methods of another.
questions.remarks: It's used to promote code reusability.
